sentence: The best way to do this is to have you impeached and convicted and  removed from office.
title: Protecting the American Dream

sentence: Speaker, I don't think it is the position of the very  distinguished gentleman that, if we find Jeffrey Epstein on the phone  with Donald Trump, he should be impeached for it, or is that his  position?
title: Notice of Intention to Offer Resolution Raising A Question of the Privileges of the House

sentence: He is already a twice- impeached President and 34 times a felon.
title: Bloody Sunday and Voting Rights Act

sentence: He believes that judges who would rule against him should be  impeached.
title: And Still I Rise: Impeaching President Trump

sentence: President Trump was impeached twice during his first term, and I  voted to impeach him both times.
title: Concerns with H. Res. 939

sentence: Where do we stand when the President has decided that there is  no separation of powers, that he can determine when a judge is right or  wrong and if that judge is wrong, that judge should be  impeached?
title: Where Do You Stand

sentence: This President has decided that judges should be impeached if they  decline to follow his mandates.
title: And Still I Rise: Denouncing the President's Authoritar-Ianism and Recognizing the Impeachment Warriors

sentence: You are likely to face a vote of  218 more persons who would vote to have you impeached.
title: Liberty and Justice for All

sentence: Remember, he was impeached by this body for inciting a violent  insurrection against us.
title: Condemning the Violent June 2025 Riots in Los Angeles, California

sentence: I just believe that this level of behavior if it were conducted,  committed, and engaged in by one Barack Hussein Obama when he was  President, if he behaved in this fashion, then he would have been  impeached.
title: Incivility in Chamber

sentence: When I see a President saying to the country that a court that has  issued an order that he does not agree with but contends is  inappropriate for various and sundry reasons, when I see that President  say that the judge that issued that order should be impeached, you are  now moving into authoritarianism.
title: Authoritarianism
